title: Karthik Pradhan

I am an experienced Software Engineer with a demonstrated history of working in the food & beverages industry. Worked on the complete development of the support website (from scratch to launch). Gained professional experience in C#, ASP.NET Web Forms, ASP.NET MVC, HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, jQuery, Bootstrap, RESTful Web Services, and MySQL.
